projectsSubtitle: A quick taste of my recent work

projectsList.title: Smart Result Locator System
projectsList.short: Automated dispensing of printed results by matric number & faculty selection.
projectsList.description: A hardware-integrated Flask app running on Raspberry Pi controlling servo motors to dispense printed statement of results. Includes search by matric number, faculty selection, and secure access.

projectsList.title: Fake News Detection (WELFake)
projectsList.short: Classifies news articles as real or fake using the WELFake dataset (~72k articles).
projectsList.description: Built a text classification pipeline (cleaning, tokenization, LSTM/BERT variants) to detect fake news. Includes an explainable dashboard.

projectsList.title: Hausa Speech Emotion Recognition
projectsList.short: Detects emotions from Hausa speech audio using MFCCs and LSTM.
projectsList.description: A custom dataset and LSTM model trained on MFCC features to classify emotions in Hausa speech. Includes an interactive demo to upload audio and get predictions.

projectsList.title: Intelligent Email Scraper
projectsList.short: Ethical web crawler that extracts and validates emails from public pages.
projectsList.description: A focused crawler with pattern recognition and basic NLP to extract likely email addresses while reducing false positives. Includes validation routines and export to CSV.

projectsList.title: Code Sharing Platform
projectsList.short: Simple full-stack code sharing with auth, posts, likes, and comments.
projectsList.description: A lightweight platform where users can share snippets, like, and discuss. Clean UI, responsive, with dark/light toggle planned.

projectsList.title: Soybean Disease Recognition
projectsList.short: Recognizes soybean leaf diseases using a curated dataset (~770 images).
projectsList.description: Built and evaluated CNN models to classify plant diseases; includes Grad-CAM visualizations to explain predictions.
